original_title: Liebe - oder Erinnerung an Judith R.
overview: Janusz, a pawnbroker in his late 40s, is confronted with the sudden death of his estranged wife. To cover up for all his failings, he hires the young prostitute Irena to act as his girlfriend and join him for the funeral. A tale about guilt, abandonment and love.
title: Love - or Memory of Judith R.
